<script>
  (function () {
    var language =
      (navigator.languages && navigator.languages[0]) ||
      navigator.language ||
      navigator.userLanguage ||
      "en";
    language = language.toLowerCase();
    var target = language.indexOf("pt") === 0 ? "./landing/pt/" : "./landing/";
    window.location.replace(target);
  })();
</script>
